articles.content:
Japan fans have candidly opened up on the main reasons for why they clean up after themselves at the end of each match at the World Cup.
The Japanese fans at the World Cup have earned praise from ma… [+1998 chars]

articles.description: The latest Nottingham Forest news as the striker was named in South Korea's starting line-up for the 0-0 draw against Uruguay on Thursday afternoon.
articles.content:
